gameDetails.name: Dungeon Roll Legends: Hero Booster Pack #2
gameDetails.description:
Dungeon Roll Legends: Hero Booster Pack #2 is a set of eight extra heroes, each with its own special and ultimate powers, for use with Dungeon Roll.  The heroes in this pack are already leveled up and more powerful than the previous heroes from the base game and expansions, but are balanced against each other and should only be pitted against one another for a fair game, or put up against previous heroes to give some players a handicap.

The new heroes include:

     Alexandra, Keeper of Knowledge
     Amar-Suen, King of the Ancients
     Cassandra, The Cursed
     Loes Yllavyre, Dragon Lord
     Marpesia, Amazon Queen
     Tou'lak, Minotaur Chieftan
     Tristan, Lone Mercenary
     Szopin, Infamous Warlord
